title: Mo Farah finishes FOUR minutes behind Chicago marathon winner Lawrence Cherono
text:
Mo Farah finished a disappointing four minutes behind winner Lawrence Cherono in Sunday's Chicago marathon.

Farah, who won the same event last year in just his third attempt at the distance, laboured to an eighth place finish in a time of 2:09:58.

The 36-year-old has endured a turbulent week after being quizzed over his association with disgraced coach Mo Salazar.

Mo Farah finished four minutes behind Chicago marathon winner Lawrence Cherono

Farah posted his worst ever time in a marathon after finishing in 2:09:58

The 36-year-old has endured a turbulent week following the banning of his former coach

The 36-year-old unleashed a verbal attack at journalists on Friday after being asked about his association with Salazar prior to his conviction for doping offences.

Farah accused the media of targeting him and suggested there was a racial element to persistent questioning, while pointing to the fact he's never failed a drugs test.

Twelve months ago Farah won the Chicago marathon after posting the eighth fastest time in the history of the event with a time of 2:05:11.
description: Mo Farah finished a disappointing four minutes behind winner Lawrence Cherono in Sunday's Chicago marathon after posting his worst ever time over the distance, one year after winning  event.
